name: Rescue Hoes Dating Sim
description: Have you ever wanted to date Bily, Jake or Rocky from Rescue Heros? Well now is your chance to become a rescue ho in this interactive story dating sim. Featuring the characters you know and love from rescue heroes but with a sexual twist. Which rescue ho will you have sex with, you decide! Also if Rescue hoes goes big, there will be more. Warning: Dirty language.
